title.rendered: Part Time Call Center Jobs – Apply at TeleDirect Today!

content.rendered:
Want the flexibility of reduced work hours, yet the opportunity to earn a decent paycheck for bills, vacations or whatever else? Consider working at our call center part time!

TeleDirect, the leader in business process outsourced (BPO) call center expertise, needs to fill plenty of part time call center jobs. If you have what it takes, we’d love to hear from you today!

Unlike some other part time jobs, TeleDirect also gives you the ability to work remotely in the comfort of your own home. We’ve been at the forefront of the work from home trend from the very start, as our call center platform relies on well-trained, professional call center agents, customer service reps and other roles – all over the world!

Our Call Center is Hiring for Part Time Jobs

Part time call center jobs give you the best of both worlds: a steady income along with the flexibility to work from home. No rush-hour commutes. Less wear and tear on your car. More free time to enjoy. And the support of the premier BPO call center firm.

TeleDirect sets up our part time call center reps up for success:

  •       Thorough, professional training
  •       The most advanced equipment (hardware & software) available for call center reps
  •       Flexible work schedules
  •       The opportunity to be a critical part of a successful team
  •       The chance to earn accolades, incentives, bonus pay and more

If you have a customer service background and are passionate about delivering value & results to our client base, you might be a great fit for our call center part time jobs. Work from home employment like our part time call center jobs are projected to grow in the near and long-term future, and now is a great time to apply!

Apply Today at TeleDirect for Part Time Call Center Jobs

Go ahead and apply today! TeleDirect’s call center is hiring for part time positions, and we’re always looking for talented professionals to join our team.

Thanks for considering TeleDirect for call center part time employment. We look forward to reviewing your application!
